entry.title: Sines of Life 72: Genre (Livestream #06)
entry.content:
Experience several meandering movements in Genre, from Pop to Progressive, and some Big Room for good measure. Grade-A entertainment from a range of cast members, including Mat Zo, Lizzo, and a delightful opener from CRJ‚Äôs stellar ‚ÄòSide B‚Äô, plus some relative oldies from Andrew Bayer and Bob Sinclar.

I‚Äôm simplifying from here on out, and releasing Livestream recordings as directly Sines of Life installments as they come, so catch the audio on Soundcloud, as well as the full Video Replay from 6/18/20 on YouTube below!

While it may go without saying at this point ‚Äì enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶

Download this mix.


Lifesine ¬∑ Sines of Life 72: Genre (Livestream #06)

entry.title: üíØ (The Babeh Mix)
entry.content:
Pretty crazy to think that in a COVID-free parallel dimension somewhere, I‚Äôd be getting married today. Since that seems not to be the plan, I‚Äôm getting creative with how I celebrate with my special lady. With that in mind, I share with all of you this perfectly personalized ‚ÄúBabeh Mix‚Äù, crafted especially for my amazing partner. üíØ minutes of üíØ% fun tracks she loves, or that say how I feel about her ‚Äì not just because it‚Äôs her favorite emoji, but because she‚Äôs üíØ, and she deserves nothing less.

Love you, Babeh üíú

And to the rest of you, enjoy this very special release, and of course ‚Äì turn it up‚Ä¶


Download this mix, and celebrate with us (remotely).

entry.title: Sines of Life 71: Kaleidoscope (Livestream #04)
entry.content:
By popular demand, last Friday‚Äôs Quarantine Livestream is now consumable as this month‚Äôs Sines of Life Radio! It feels a bit like cheating to turn a live set into the monthly mixtape, but I‚Äôm puttin‚Äô in the work either way, so you might as well get both flavors üòâ

Lot‚Äôs of extended transitions, giving the whole set a semi-mashup vibe. Eclectic as always, we‚Äôve got Jason Ross, Rita Ora, London Grammar, a pair of feel-good tracks from RAC, and much more.

You can also check out the Video Replay of Livestream #04 if you want the full show.

Enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶

Download this mix.

entry.title: Sines of Life 70: Funk Pilot (Livestream #02)
entry.content:
Last week‚Äôs Lifesine Livestream #02 was so much fun that I‚Äôve thrown a little polish on it and officially released it as this month‚Äôs episode of SOL Radio. Enjoy all that fun & funk over again in Funk Pilot.

Missed the Livestream? No sweat ‚Äì head over to my YouTube Channel at videos.lifesinemusic.com where you can (re)watch me workin‚Äô for those sound waves. Plus, sign-up for my new VIP Mailing List at vip.lifesinemusic.com to receive updates and announcements for all future events and streams!

Enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶

Download this mix.

entry.title: Sines of Life 69: Stir Crazy
entry.content:
A little something to keep you dancing in your living rooms, which is just about the only place any of us are dancing at present. This one‚Äôs got some fun, some funk, and a whole lot of catchy vocals, coming at you from a wide array of artists including Kaskade, Sam Smith, JackLNDN, Tinlicker, and many more. I even snuck one in from Carly Rae to keep the fianc√© happy.

Be good to each other, enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶ oh, and wash your hands (we‚Äôll look back and laugh at this later.. I hope)

Download this mix.

  1. Tinlicker - Fractal
  2. Kaskade - Love Like That

entry.title: Sines of Life 68: We Are What We Do

link.title: Sines of Life 68: We Are What We Do

entry.content:
Quite the collection of personal favorites in this month‚Äôs roster of featured artists. We find ourselves both opening and closing this episode with songs from Lane 8‚Äôs latest and unsurprisingly triumphant new artist album, plus a dyad of refreshed 80‚Äôs classics thanks to Above & Beyond and Shane 54 respectively putting a modern twist onto two old favorites. Sprinkle in the likes of Marsh, Spencer Brown, Dezza, and something new-ish from Mat Zo and you‚Äôre in for more than one treat.

Enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶

Download this mix.

  1. Lane 8 - Road feat. Arctic Lake
  2. Marsh - 1992
  3. Eli & Fur - Into The Night
  4. 3LAU - Tokyo feat. XIRA

entry.title: Sines of Life 67: Hot & Cold
entry.content:
A story of exploration, infatuation, paradise lost, and acceptance‚Ä¶ ‚ÄòHot & Cold‚Äô takes you on a relationship roller coaster in audio form. Whether you‚Äôre looking to crank up the heat with instant earworms from Lizzo, David Guetta, and Phoebe Ryan, or cool things down a notch with the mellow stylings of Shallou and Qrion, this storytime mix has got something for you.

Not quite a BackTrack, but I found myself craving some old-school Benassi, so I‚Äôm sure you‚Äôll all recognize his timeless ‚ÄòBeautiful People‚Äô in the final act. Enjoy, and turn it up‚Ä¶

Download this mix.
